unnormalised: Hey guys, on pesticide usage! My kisan dada in UP says things changed after the 1990s. Earlier, it was all desi jugaad. Now, it's expensive stuff, costing Rs. 5000/acre! Is it really helping yields? Thinking of organic farming like that farmer in Kerala, maybe after 20/10/2024. Anyone tried that near Chandigarh? What about alternatives from IARI, maybe around 14:00 hrs, on 10/07/2023? Seems like a big issue discussed since independence on 15/08/1947.
normalised: Hey guys, on pesticide usage! My kisan dada in U P says things changed after the nineteen nineties. Earlier, it was all desi jugaad. Now, it's expensive stuff, costing rupee five thousand per acre! Is it really helping yields? Thinking of organic farming like that farmer in Kerala, maybe after twentieth october two thousand and twenty four. Anyone tried that near Chandigarh? What about alternatives from I A R I, maybe around fourteen hundred hours, on tenth july two thousand and twenty three? Seems like a big issue discussed since independence on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven.
